name: Hero Rescue -- Legend About Hero,Monster,Magic
description:
Hero Rescue is a wonderful and funny time killer free puzzle game!It's easy and fun to play and you can take on this puzzling Saga alone or without wifi.

Heroes have been trapped by evil monster, and the only chance to rescue them and protect the peace land is up to you! Be the super hero!

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and save the heroes from the evil monsters! Moves are limited in some level, so plan them carefully.Your puzzle skills will be tested with hours of block busting fun!

Play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Hero Rescue is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment. You can turn off payment features by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hero Rescue Features:
• Puzzle game with RPG strategy.
• Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay!
• Free Lucky Wheel spinning every day!
• Lovable heroes of all varieties with cute vocals!
• Diamonds, Exploding Bombs, Elites, Boss, Chest, Cannons, Rockets, Saint Water and much more!
• Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses unlocked after levels passed!
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master!
• 150 amazing levels now, and more added soon!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

Follow us to get news and updates:

https://twitter.com/HeroRescueSaga
https://www.facebook.com/Hero-Rescue-Saga-1644372152542811/

Have fun and Enjoy Hero Rescue.

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Hero Rescue Saga!
Hero Rescue is completely free to play and you can play with no wifi and you can unlock full game features when connected to the Internet.
